description: Indulge in the rich, bold flavors of an Espresso Martini, a delightful blend of coffee and vodka that will awaken your senses. Perfect for a night out or a cozy evening in, this cocktail is sure to impress your guests.
instructions: Brew a shot of espresso and let it cool slightly.
In a cocktail shaker, combine vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup.
Fill the shaker with ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds.
Strain the mixture into chilled martini glasses.
Garnish with a few coffee beans on top.
tips: For the best flavor, use freshly brewed espresso and adjust the sweetness to your preference with simple syrup.

Preparation:

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Shake vigorously to create a frothy top.
  • A common mistake is using hot espresso, which can dilute the drink.
  • Look for a nice froth on top to indicate it's ready.
  • Store any leftover ingredients in the fridge for freshness.

For a twist, try adding a splash of flavored syrup like vanilla or hazelnut, or use flavored vodka for an extra kick.
Pair with chocolate desserts or serve alongside a cheese platter for a sophisticated touch.
For a vegan version, use a plant-based milk in place of simple syrup, or try a non-alcoholic coffee liqueur for a mocktail.
